author: sky.cactus
content: Sometimes the speaker doesn't know there is a problem.  I have a relatively nice mic, but in a call recently there was static on the line from an unknown source and I didn't find out until after the call.

author: sky.cactus
content: Sometimes, people just are using crappy laptop mics.  :)

author: zkfloof
content: if you already have airpods they work surprisingly well
